nodes.text: The Greenputt Governing Council was a committee headquartered in Tecave City on the planet Cerea that oversaw the major leagues of the sport of greenputt, including the Professional Greenputt Tour, the Female Professional Greenputt Tour, the Asexual Professional Greenputt Tour, the Not-Dead-Yet Professional Greenputt Tour, and the Non-Limbed Professional Greenputt Tour. In 22 BBY, it added the Non-Sentient Professional Greenputt Tour (NSPGT) to the list of recognized greenputt leagues after certifying the Taurill Bortis and three Ambrian neeks as having consistent skill in playing the sport.
The Greenputt Governing Council was first mentioned in the in-universe news story "Yet Another Greenputt League," which was published on the HoloNet News website in 2002.
